'''12w30e''' is the nineteenth and the final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.3.1]], released on July 25, 2012<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20120727224529/https://www.mojang.com/2012/07/minecraft-snapshot-12w30d/</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[12w30d]] snapshot.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed [[cocoa beans]] not being able to be planted on rotated [[Log|wood]] blocks.
* Fixed duplication bug in [[Creative]] mode.<ref>{{tweet|jeb|228062707402821632}}</ref>
* Fixed the Survival inventory in Creative mode.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 12w30e is one of only three fifth-in-a-week snapshots to ever be released (alongside [[13w47e]] and [[15w35e]]), and the only one for version 1.3.1.
** It is also the first ever "e" snapshot.
